title: 摩連奴理性分析曼聯輸波原因

replies.msg:
賽後，曼聯領隊摩連奴作出了分析，指出曼聯不勝的原因。 

「我最主要就係想指一曼聯失分的最大原因，當然球員和教練團隊都有一定的責任，但我認為最大的問題是反曼的那幫人，我上社交網站上看到，他們日日都在評擊曼聯，是曼聯輸波的關鍵！如果不喜歡曼聯的話，就請支持其他球隊，為什麼日日都想希望曼聯輸波？」摩連奴大惑不解。 

「曼聯這季的成績大幅下滑，都是因為那班反曼的7頭日日在咀咒曼聯輸波，而最不幸的是，竟然連個天都幫埋佢地，搞到曼聯打到咁差。」摩連奴續說。 被問到球隊日後的戰術對策時，摩連奴呼籲各隊球迷支持曼聯：「我明白有批評才有進步，但現在的曼聯，真的很需要各隊球迷的支持，才能重震雄風！請停止對曼聯的批評或咀咒，並關閉其有關的專頁和網站！曼聯成績下滑最要主原因是反曼人士不斷的干擾，如果他們的不停止反曼行動的話，那就消滅他們吧！只有這樣做才可以令曼聯做番一隊英超BIG 4！」

After the game, Manchester United team leader Morino made an analysis, pointing out why Manchester United is victorious.

"My main reason is to refer to the biggest reason why Manchester United lost points. Of course, the players and the coaching team have certain responsibilities, but I think the biggest problem is the anti-Mann people. I saw them on social networking sites. It’s the key to Manchester United’s loss every day. If you don’t like Manchester United, please support other teams. Why do you want Manchester United to lose every day?” Morino was puzzled.

"Manchester United's performance in this season has fallen sharply, because the 7 anti-Man's 7 days in the curse of Manchester United's loss, and the most unfortunate thing is that even a day to help the ground, get Manchester United hit 咁Poor." Morinu continued. When asked about the team's tactical countermeasures in the future, Morinu appealed to the fans of the teams to support Manchester United: "I understand that there are criticisms to make progress, but now Manchester United, really need the support of the fans of each team, in order to tremble! Please stop the criticism or curse of Manchester United and close its related pages and websites! The main reason for the decline in Manchester United's performance is the constant interference of anti-Manns. If they do not stop anti-Man operations, then destroy them. Only by doing so can Manchester United be the Premier League BIG 4!"

Team leader

Make/Do analysis, no an

Mourinho claimed “haters” after losing to rival.

即刻真晒
